mapper.select: select * from tc_human where human_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into tc_human (human_id, human_name, region_type, region_name, unit_id, unit_name, age,tel_mobile) values (#{humanID}, #{humanName}, #{regionType}, #{regionName}, #{unitID}, #{unitName}, #{age}, #{telMobile})
